<script id="docTranslationRequestSentTemplate" type="text/x-kendo-template">
    <div class="static-notification-content">      
        <div class="toastrContent">
            #if(downloadLocation==='LocalDrive' && downloadType==='both'){#
            <p>Your documents are being translated and compiled.</p>
            #}else if(downloadLocation==='GoogleDrive' && downloadType==='both'){#
            <p>Your documents are being translated.</p>
            #}else{#
            <p>Your document is being translated.</p>
            #}#
            #if(firstTranslation===true){#
            <p>You will receive a notification and an email when it is complete.</p>
            #}#
        </div>       
    </div>
</script>

<script id="docTranslationCompletedTemplate" type="text/x-kendo-template">

        </div>

            <a href="\\#" onclick="openPicker('#:docId#', '#:downloadOptionId#', '#:toLanguage#', event)">Choose Google Drive folder</a>
            #}else{#
            <a href="#:message.DownloadLink#" target="_blank">Download document</a>
            #}#
        </div>
    </div>
</script>

<!-- JQuery Template for PA Suggestions -->
<script id="pa-suggestions-empty-template" type="text/x-jquery-tmpl">
    
    <li>
        <div class="row noSharedDocumentsText" style="margin-top:20px;">
            <div class="col-xs-12">
                "Others were interested in" is based on what documents your colleagues have used along with this one. Keep using practice aids to help us populate this feature.
            </div>
        </div>
    </li>
</script>

<script id="pa-suggestions-template" type="text/x-jquery-tmpl">
    
    <li>
        
        <div class="row no-right-gutters">
            <div class="col-lg-1 col-md-1 col-sm-1 col-xs-2 suggestedOptionsFileIcon">
                <div class="file-icon">
                    <img class="attachment-icon" src="/content/images/search_icons/${IconName}">
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-lg-11 col-md-11 col-sm-11 col-xs-10 noPaddingLeft suggestedOptionsTextContainer">
                <div class="suggestedOptionsText">

                    <div class="usr-result-info-container">

                        <span class="usr-gold inline"><img class="${IsGold}" alt="Gold" src="/Content/images/star-tangerine.svg" height="16" width="16" /></span>

                        <div class="usr-title inline">
                            <a target="_blank" href="/UnifiedSearch/PADetailsFull?paDocId=${DocumentId}">${DocumentName}</a>
                        </div>
                        <div class="external-link-thumbnail-black"></div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        
    </li>
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">

                                                                <div class="personalize-box" data-box-selected="false" data-ownership-type="Sectors" data-topic-area-system-name="S-EnergyUtilitiesandResources">
                                                                    <p>Energy, Utilities, and Resources (EUR)</p><p>
                                                                </p></div>
                                                            </div>
                                                            <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12 lessPadding">
                                                                <div class="personalize-box" data-box-selected="false" data-ownership-type="Sectors" data-topic-area-system-name="S-FinancialServicesFS">
                                                                    <p>Financial Services (FS)</p>
                                                                </div>
                                                            </div>
                                                            <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12 lessPadding">
                                                                <div class="personalize-box" data-box-selected="false" data-ownership-type="Sectors" data-topic-area-system-name="S-GovtPublicServicesGPS">
                                                                    <p>Govt. &amp; Public Services (G&amp;PS)</p>
                                                                </div>
                                                            </div>
                                                            <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12 lessPadding">
                                                                <div class="personalize-box" data-box-selected="false" data-ownership-type="Sectors" data-topic-area-system-name="S-HealthIndustriesHI">
                                                                    <p>Health Industries (HI)</p>
                                                                </div>
                                                            </div>
                                                            <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12 lessPadding">
                                                                <div class="personalize-box" data-box-selected="false" data-ownership-type="Sectors" data-topic-area-system-name="S-IndustrialManufacturingandAutomotive">
                                                                    <p>Industrial Manufacturing and Automotive (IM&amp;A)</p>
                                                                </div>
                                                            </div>
                                                            <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12 lessPadding">
                                                                <div class="personalize-box" data-box-selected="false" data-ownership-type="Sectors" data-topic-area-system-name="S-PESIF">
                                                                    <p>Private Equity, Real Assets &amp; Sovereign Funds</p>
                                                                </div>
                                                            </div>
                                                            <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12 lessPadding">
                                                                <div class="personalize-box" data-box-selected="false" data-ownership-type="Sectors" data-topic-area-system-name="S-TechnologyMediaandTelecommunicationsTMT">
                                                                    <p>Technology, Media and Telecommunications (TMT)</p>
                                                                </div>
                                                            </div>
                                                        </div>
                                                    </div>
                                                </div>
                                            </div>

                                            <button type="button" name="previous" class="previous action-button-previous greyOutlineButton additionalMarginLeft">
                                                <i class="fa fa-chevron-left" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                                                Back: Integrated Solutions
                                            </button>
                                            <button type="button" name="next" class="next action-button pinkOutlineButton additionalMarginRight">
                                                Next: Practice Areas
                                                <i class="fa fa-chevron-right" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                                            </button>
                                        </fieldset>

                                            Renamed to Practice Areas 01/2021

                                        <fieldset>

                                        <!--Complete form-->
                                        <fieldset>
                                            <div class="form-card lastPage">
                                                <div class="content">
                                                    <div class="profilePhotoWithTracker">
                                                        <div class="profilePhotoPlaceHolder">
                                                            <div class="circle-progress-bar" style="position:absolute;"><canvas width="337" height="337" style="height: 300px; width: 300px;"></canvas></div>
                                                            <img src="/People/Thumbnail/bc3f3780-805b-4ee3-9914-85528a6359f1" class="userProfilePhoto profile-image" style="display:none;">
                                                            <div class="profileImageDefault profileWizard" style="display:none;">DE</div>
                                                        </div>

                                                        <h3 class="complete-message" style="display:none">

                                                        </h3>

                                                            Your profile is still <span class="percentage">80%</span> done.
                                                        </h3>
                                                    </div>

                                                        <p class="complete-message" style="display:none">All done, your profile is now complete and you will enjoy a personalised experience.</p>
                                                        <p class="incomplete-message" style="">Can't complete this yet? No problem. Visit your profile anytime to reach 100%.</p>
                                                    </div>
                                                </div>
                                            </div>

                                                <i class="fa fa-chevron-left" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                                                Back: Practice Areas
                                            </button>
                                            <button type="button" name="make_payment" class="next action-button pinkOutlineButton additionalMarginRight explore-cs">
                                                Next: Explore CS
                                                <i class="fa fa-chevron-right" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                                            </button>
                                        </fieldset>

                                        <!-- progressbar Desktop -->
                                        <div class="progressBarContainer visible-lg hidden-md hidden-sm">
                                            <ul class="progressbar">
                                                <li class="active"><strong><i class="fa fa-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i></strong></li>
                                                <li><strong><i class="fa fa-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i></strong></li>
                                                <li><strong><i class="fa fa-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i></strong></li>
                                                <li><strong><i class="fa fa-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i></strong></li>
                                                <li><strong><i class="fa fa-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i></strong></li>
                                                <li><strong><i class="fa fa-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i></strong></li>

                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var _previouslySelected = "";
    var _savedSelections = "";

    $(document).ready(function () {
        // Prevent double runs
        $(".personalize-box").unbind('click');
        $(".next").unbind('click');
        $(".previous").unbind('click');
        $('.personalizationWizard').unbind('hidden.bs.modal');
        $('.personalizationWizard').unbind('show.bs.modal');

        var url = window.location.href;
        var urlParts = url.substring(url.toLowerCase().indexOf("details"), url.indexOf("#"));
        var pagePartyId = urlParts.split("/")[1];
        var loggedInUserPartyId = 'bc3f3780-805b-4ee3-9914-85528a6359f1';

        // Global variables
        var _pageUserIsLoggedInUser = (pagePartyId == loggedInUserPartyId);
        var _userHasSelectedPersonalization = false;
        var _pageIsPeoplePage = window.location.href.toLowerCase().indexOf("/people/") != -1;
        var _progressBarComplete = 1.0;
        var _progressBarIncomplete = 0.6;

        var current_fs, next_fs, previous_fs; //fieldsets
        var opacity;
        var trackSaveStatus = 0; // not saved

        getUserProfileWizardData(_pageIsPeoplePage, _pageUserIsLoggedInUser);

        /* METHODS */

        function getUserProfileWizardData(pageIsPeoplePage, pageUserIsLoggedInUser) {
            $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: "/UserNotifications/UserProfileWizardData",
                data: { userName: "degorenko001" },
                cache: false,
                async: true,
                success: function (data) {
                    // set global variables
                    _userHasSelectedPersonalization = data.UserHasSelectedPersonalization;
                    _savedSelections = data.UserSelectedRecommendedPracticeAid;

                    var openWizardModal = pageUserIsLoggedInUser && pageIsPeoplePage;

                    initializeUi(data.UserHasSelectedPersonalization, openWizardModal);
                },
                error: function (request, status, error) {
                    console.log("Error in getUserProfileWizardData(): " + request.responseText);
                }
            });
        }

        $(".personalize-box").click(function(){
            var boxIsSelected = $(this).hasClass("box-is-selected");

            $(this).removeClass("box-is-selected");
            $(this).removeClass("box-is-not-selected");

            if (boxIsSelected == false) {
                $(this).addClass("box-is-selected");
            }
            else {
                $(this).addClass("box-is-not-selected");
            }
        });

        $(".next").off("click").on("click", function (e) {
            current_fs = $(this).parent();
            next_fs = $(this).parent().next();

            if ($(this).hasClass("explore-cs")) {
                // Redirect to home page. Only when user is on people page.
                if (_pageIsPeoplePage) {
                    saveWizardToDb();
                    if (_previouslySelected.replaceAll('::', '') !== _savedSelections.replaceAll('::', '')) {
                        var metricsData = CsMetrics.metricsData;
                        metricsData.customData.contextId = contextID;
                        metricsData.customData.contentId = null;
                        //metricsData.customData = null;
                        CsMetrics.addMetrics(CsMetrics.metrictTypeId.navigate, CsMetrics.action.savePersonalizationWizard, metricsData);
                    } else {
                        var metricsData = CsMetrics.metricsData;
                        metricsData.customData.contextId = contextID;
                        metricsData.customData.contentId = null;
                        //metricsData.customData = null;
                        CsMetrics.addMetrics(CsMetrics.metrictTypeId.navigate, CsMetrics.action.openPersonalizationWizardWithoutSaving, metricsData);
                    }
                    window.location.href = "/";
                } else {
                    $(".personalizationWizard").modal("hide");
                    $('.navOverlay').removeClass('item-open');
                    if (_previouslySelected.replaceAll('::', '') !== _savedSelections.replaceAll('::', '')) {
                        var metricsData = CsMetrics.metricsData;
                        metricsData.customData.contextId = contextID;
                        metricsData.customData.contentId = null;
                        //metricsData.customData = null;
                        CsMetrics.addMetrics(CsMetrics.metrictTypeId.navigate, CsMetrics.action.savePersonalizationWizard, metricsData);
                    } else {
                        var metricsData = CsMetrics.metricsData;
                        metricsData.customData.contextId = contextID;
                        metricsData.customData.contentId = null;
                        //metricsData.customData = null;
                        CsMetrics.addMetrics(CsMetrics.metrictTypeId.navigate, CsMetrics.action.openPersonalizationWizardWithoutSaving, metricsData);
                    }
                }
                return;
            }

            if ($(this).hasClass("save-wizard")) {
                var noOfRecordsSaved = saveWizardToDb();
                var userProfileIsComplete = noOfRecordsSaved > 0;

                setUiMessages(userProfileIsComplete);
            }

            $(".form-page-number-desktop").html(parseInt($(".form-page-number-desktop").html()) + 1);
            $(".form-page-number-mobile").html(parseInt($(".form-page-number-mobile").html()) + 1);

            $(".progressbar li").eq($("fieldset").index(next_fs)).addClass("active");
            $(".progressbar-mobile li").eq($("fieldset").index(next_fs)).addClass("active");

            $(".progressbar li").eq($("fieldset").index(current_fs)).removeClass("active");
            $(".progressbar-mobile li").eq($("fieldset").index(current_fs)).removeClass("active");

            //show the next fieldset
            next_fs.show();

            //hide the current fieldset with style
            current_fs.animate({opacity: 0}, {
                step: function (now) {
                opacity = 1 - now;
                current_fs.css({
                    'display': 'none',
                    'position': 'relative'
                });
                next_fs.css({'opacity': opacity});
                },
                duration: 600
            });

            // Stop page from navigating away from homepage
            e.preventDefault();
        });

        function setCircleProgressBar(profileIsComplete) {
            var circleStatusValue = (profileIsComplete) ? _progressBarComplete : _progressBarIncomplete;

            $('.circle-progress-bar').circleProgress({
                value: circleStatusValue,
                size: 300.0,  // Size of the circle / canvas in pixels
                thickness: 12, // Width of the arc. ex 'auto'
                fill: {
                    gradient: ['#4eb622', '#4eb622']
                }
            });
        }

        function setHeaderCircleProgressBar(profileIsComplete) {
            var circleStatusValue = (profileIsComplete) ? _progressBarComplete : _progressBarIncomplete;

            if (profileIsComplete) {
                $('.header-user-circle-progress-bar').hide();
            }
            else {
                // NOTE: This is in _userProfile.cshtml
                $('.header-user-circle-progress-bar').show();

                $('.header-user-circle-progress-bar').circleProgress({
                    value: _progressBarIncomplete,
                    size: 40,
                    thickness: 2.2, // Width of the arc. ex 'auto'
                    fill: {
                        gradient: ['#4eb622', '#4eb622']
                    }
                });
            }
        }

        function saveWizardToDb() {
            var ownershipType = "";
            var topicAreaSystemName = "";
            var selectedValues = "";
            var selectedBoxes = $(".box-is-selected");

            _savedSelections = "";

            selectedBoxes.each(function () {
                ownershipType = ($(this).attr("data-ownership-type"));
                topicAreaSystemName =  $(this).attr("data-topic-area-system-name");
                selectedValues += ownershipType + "|" + topicAreaSystemName + ",";

                // update global variable
                _savedSelections += ownershipType + ">>>" + topicAreaSystemName;
            });

            $.ajax({
                type: "POST", //HTTP POST Method
                url: "/People/SavePersonalizeRecommendedData",
                data: { PartyId: "degorenko001", SelectedValues: selectedValues },
                cache: false,
                async: true,
                success: function (data) {
                    $('#recommended-ribbon-page-data').html("");
                    $('#recommended-ribbon-page-data').hide();
                    $('#recommended-ribbon-ajax-data').html(data);
                    $('#recommended-ribbon-ajax-data').show();

                    trackSaveStatus = 1; // saved
                }
            });

            // Update circle progress bars
            var profileIsComplete = selectedBoxes.length > 0;
            setCircleProgressBar(profileIsComplete);
            setHeaderCircleProgressBar(profileIsComplete);

            return selectedBoxes.length;
        }

        $(".previous").click(function(){
            $(".form-page-number-desktop").html(parseInt($(".form-page-number-desktop").html()) - 1);
            $(".form-page-number-mobile").html(parseInt($(".form-page-number-mobile").html()) - 1);

            current_fs = $(this).parent();
            previous_fs = $(this).parent().prev();

            // Update progress dots
            $(".progressbar li").eq($("fieldset").index(current_fs)).removeClass("active");
            $(".progressbar-mobile li").eq($("fieldset").index(current_fs)).removeClass("active");

            $(".progressbar li").eq($("fieldset").index(previous_fs)).addClass("active");
            $(".progressbar-mobile li").eq($("fieldset").index(previous_fs)).addClass("active");

            //show the previous fieldset
            previous_fs.show();

            //hide the current fieldset with style
            current_fs.animate({opacity: 0}, {
                step: function(now) {
                // for making fielset appear animation
                opacity = 1 - now;

                current_fs.css({
                    'display': 'none',
                    'position': 'relative'
                });

                previous_fs.css({'opacity': opacity});
                },
                duration: 600
            });
        });

        $('.personalizationWizard').on('hidden.bs.modal', function () {
            // set back to 0 for the next time the user opens the wizard
            trackSaveStatus = 0;
        });

        $('.personalizationWizard').on('show.bs.modal', function () {
            // highlight selected filters
            selectSavedItems(_savedSelections);
            _previouslySelected = _savedSelections;

            var userProfileIsComplete = $(".box-is-selected").length > 0;

            setUiMessages(userProfileIsComplete);
            setCircleProgressBar(userProfileIsComplete);

            // hide all pages then move to the first page
            $("fieldset").hide();
            $("fieldset").eq(0).show();
            $("fieldset").eq(0).css({ 'opacity': 100 });

            // clear all bar dots
            $(".progressbar li").removeClass("active");
            $(".progressbar-mobile li").removeClass("active");

            // Set progress bar dots to first page
            $(".progressbar li").eq(0).addClass("active");
            $(".progressbar-mobile li").eq(0).addClass("active");

            // Set modal page number
            $(".form-page-number-desktop").html(1);
            $(".form-page-number-mobile").html(1);

            // Hide or show initials or profile image
            $.ajax({
                type: "GET",
                url: "/People/Thumbnail/?id=bc3f3780-805b-4ee3-9914-85528a6359f1",
                async: true,
                success: function (data) {
                    if (data.length === 0) {
                        $('.userProfilePhoto').hide();
                        $('.profileImageDefault').show();
                    }
                    else {
                        $('.userProfilePhoto').show();
                        $('.profileImageDefault').hide();
                        // Refresh profile image
                        $('.profile-image').attr('src', '/People/Thumbnail/?id=bc3f3780-805b-4ee3-9914-85528a6359f1&refresh=' + Math.random());
                    }
                },
                error: function (request, status, error) {
                    console.log("Error checking profile image: " + request.responseText);
                }
            });

            var metricsData = CsMetrics.metricsData;
            metricsData.customData.contextId = contextID;
            metricsData.customData.contentId = null;
            //metricsData.customData = null;
            CsMetrics.addMetrics(CsMetrics.metrictTypeId.navigate, CsMetrics.action.openPersonalizationWizard, metricsData);
        });

        $('.editProfileButton').on('click', function () {
            $('.navOverlay').addClass('item-open');
        });

        $(".personalizationWizard .close").on("click", function () {
            if (_previouslySelected.replaceAll('::', '') !== _savedSelections.replaceAll('::', '')) {
                var metricsData = CsMetrics.metricsData;
                metricsData.customData.contextId = contextID;
                metricsData.customData.contentId = null;
                //metricsData.customData = null;
                CsMetrics.addMetrics(CsMetrics.metrictTypeId.navigate, CsMetrics.action.savePersonalizationWizard, metricsData);
            } else {
                var metricsData = CsMetrics.metricsData;
                metricsData.customData.contextId = contextID;
                metricsData.customData.contentId = null;
                //metricsData.customData = null;
                CsMetrics.addMetrics(CsMetrics.metrictTypeId.navigate, CsMetrics.action.openPersonalizationWizardWithoutSaving, metricsData);
            }
            $(".personalizationWizard").hide();
            $('.navOverlay').removeClass('item-open');
        });

        function selectSavedItems(savedSelections) {
            $('.personalize-box').removeClass("box-is-selected");
            $('.personalize-box').removeClass("box-is-not-selected");

            $('.personalize-box').each(function () {
                var ownershipType = $(this).attr('data-ownership-type')
                var topicArea = $(this).attr('data-topic-area-system-name')
                var search = ownershipType + ">>>" + topicArea;

                if (typeof savedSelections != 'undefined' && savedSelections != null && savedSelections.indexOf(search) != -1) {
                    $(this).addClass("box-is-selected");
                    $(this).attr("data-box-selected", "true");
                }
            });
        }

        function setUiMessages(userProfileIsComplete) {
            if (!userProfileIsComplete) {
                // Show 80% complete
                $(".complete-percent").html("80%");

                $(".percentage").html("80%");
                $(".complete-message").hide();
                $(".incomplete-message").show();
                $(".user-profile-dropdown-complete").hide();
                $(".user-profile-dropdown-incomplete").show();

                $('.congratulations-circle-progress-bar').circleProgress({
                    value: _progressBarIncomplete,
                    size: 300.0,  // Size of the circle / canvas in pixels
                    thickness: 12, // Width of the arc. ex 'auto'
                    fill: {
                        gradient: ['#4eb622', '#4eb622'] // or color: '#3aeabb', or image: 'http://i.imgur.com/pT0i89v.png'
                    }
                });
            }
            else {
                // Show 100% complete
                $(".complete-percent").html("100%");

                $(".percentage").html("100%");
                $(".complete-message").show();
                $(".incomplete-message").hide();
                $(".user-profile-dropdown-complete").show();
                $(".user-profile-dropdown-incomplete").hide();

                $('.congratulations-circle-progress-bar').circleProgress({
                    value: _progressBarComplete,
                    size: 300.0,  // Size of the circle / canvas in pixels
                    thickness: 12, // Width of the arc. ex 'auto'
                    fill: {
                        gradient: ['#4eb622', '#4eb622'] // or color: '#3aeabb', or image: 'http://i.imgur.com/pT0i89v.png'
                    }
                });
            }
        }

        function initializeUi(userProfileIsComplete, pageIsPeoplePage) {
            // Set user initials in wizard
            var userName = 'degorenko001';
            var userInitials = userName.substr(0, 2).toUpperCase();
            $('.profileImageDefault.siteheader').text(userInitials);
            $('.profileImageDefault.profileWizard').text(userInitials);

            selectSavedItems(_savedSelections);
            setUiMessages(userProfileIsComplete);
            setCircleProgressBar(userProfileIsComplete);

            // Open wizard if on People page and profile is not complete
            if (pageIsPeoplePage && !userProfileIsComplete) {
                $(".personalizationWizard").modal("show");
                $('.navOverlay').addClass('item-open');
            }
        }

        //function addMetrics(metricTypeId, action, metricsData) {
        //    metricsData.siteId = 1;
        //    metricsData.partyId = partyId; // global variable
        //    metricsData.metricTypeId = metricTypeId;
        //    metricsData.metricActionId = action;
        //    metricsData.origin = window.location.href;
        //    metricsData.customData.userSessionLogId = userSessionLogId; // global variable
        //    CsMetrics.add(metricsData);
        //}
    });

</script></div>

                <p>This deck is explaining how key disruptive forces are reshaping the Mining &amp; Metals industry, the collective impact on Value chain, Customer, M&amp;A, Technology and the Vision of the industry of the future. It also explains how the ADAPT framework can be applied to EU&amp;R.</p>

            <div class="abstract">
                <p>This deck is explaining how key disruptive forces are reshaping the Chemicals industry, the collective impact on Value chain, Customer, M&amp;A, Technology and the Vision of the industry of the future. It also explains how the ADAPT framework can be applied to EU&amp;R.</p>

    <!--Abstract-->
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-xs-12">
            <div class="abstract">
                <p>On behalf of PwC Partners and employees, we are delighted to present the results of the 4th edition of our Digital Procurement Survey. 
Note: Territory data and insights available for - Turkey, France, Greece, Canada, Middle East, BeNeLux, Spain, SE Asia, South America, Maghreb, Japan, Australia, DACH (Germany, Switzerland, Austria), UK, Sub-Saharan Africa. 
Please contact your local Procurement &amp; Supply Chain Consulting Teams to obtain the territory data and insights.</p>
            <p class="abstract-ellipses-text">(See more)</p></div>
        </div>

    <!--Abstract-->
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-xs-12">
            <div class="abstract">
                <p>Why does this matter for Health Industry companies?
COVID-19 pandemic revealed serious challenges health industry faces: unprecedented growth in demand and a short supply of skilled workforce with pressure to improve patient satisfaction and reduce costs. Looking forward, it will be critical to hire, develop, and retain the right talent, therefore HR transformation is of utmost importance.

To prepare for next, HR leaders must balance growth and efficiency - delivering value now while creating a future agenda. PwCâ€™s HR Transformation Solution combines smarter people strategies with emerging technologies and a connected human experience to deliver a transformation that is built to last.</p>
            <p class="abstract-ellipses-text">(See more)</p></div>
        </div>
    </div>

            <div class="abstract">
                <p>This playbook is designed to facilitate a greater understanding of the relevance of the Compliance. Transformed. proposition to your industry, FY21 priorities and strategically important accounts; empower lead partners to engage in compliance conversations with clients to qualify opportunities; and harness insights from Salesforce data to support the pursuit process and identify tactical and strategic opportunities.</p>

                <p>The UK media industry can use the crisis period to re-orientate their proposition, messages and content to better address changing consumer behaviours. Published at: https://www.strategyand.pwc.com/uk/en/insights/where-next-for-media.html</p>

    <!--Abstract-->
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-xs-12">
            <div class="abstract">
                <p>The traditional and dominant linear economic model of â€œtake, make, use, and wasteâ€ is unsustainable. The linear model is not only wasteful but also environmentally damaging. Regulators and customers want an end to the linear model and are demanding environmentally friendly practices and products. The linear modelâ€™s successor is the circular economy model (CE), which seeks to reuse products and treats waste as a loss of value. Companies are adopting the CE as it can lead to competitive advantage, offers a response to customers, and is less damaging to the environment. The CE can lower operating costs and create new products and services that facilitate incremental value creation and sustained growth.</p>
            <p class="abstract-ellipses-text">(See more)</p></div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!--Abstract-->
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-xs-12">
            <div class="abstract">
                <p>While the short term effects of the pandemic will be keenly felt by the engineering and construction industry, it must also be aware of any potentially transformative medium and longer term impact. Published at: https://www.strategyand.pwc.com/uk/en/insights/where-next-for-engineering.html</p>
            <p class="abstract-ellipses-text">(See more)</p></div>

                <p>The healthcare industry responded with astonishing speed to the
shock of the COVID-19 pandemic. As we start to move from crisis
response to recovery and reform, we all owe a debt of gratitude
to our healthcare and aged-care workers and leaders for their
commitment and sacrifice.</p>

    <!--Abstract-->
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-xs-12">
            <div class="abstract">
                <p>The Government of India (GoI) recently launched a Production Linked
Incentive (PLI) Scheme for the active pharmaceutical ingredient (API)
industry, in line with the theme of building an Aatmanirbhar Bharat (selfreliant India). Indiaâ€™s dependency on the import of APIs from a single source
has increased substantially in the recent past and could pose a potential
threat to national drug security.
The scheme is a step in the right direction towards making the API industry
self-reliant over a period of time. The scheme should ensure that its
benefits promote sustainable growth of the API industry by focusing on the
industryâ€™s long-term survivability. For the schemeâ€™s success, key elements
like scale of operations and backward integration need to be addressed.</p>
            <p class="abstract-ellipses-text">(See more)</p></div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!--Abstract-->
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-xs-12">
            <div class="abstract">
                <p>Climate change has become one of the most important issues globally, putting increasing pressure on the business models of companies in the food and beverage sector due to increasing physical and transition risks. PwC has since integrated and refined Climate Excellence, a climate scenario analysis tool that helps companies to assess these risks and opportunities. It may therefore also help the food and beverage industry to better understand and manage this global challenge.</p>
            <p class="abstract-ellipses-text">(See more)</p></div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!--Abstract-->
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-xs-12">
            <div class="abstract">
                <p>This deck is explaining how key disruptive forces are reshaping the Power &amp; Utilities industry, the collective impact on Value chain, Customer, M&amp;A, Technology and the Vision of the industry of the future.
It also explains how the ADAPT framework can be applied to EU&amp;R.</p>
            <p class="abstract-ellipses-text">(See more)</p></div>

                <p>Energy providers are coping with a huge and sudden shift in consumption and demand. They should use this challenge to create stronger business models for the future. Published at: https://www.strategyand.pwc.com/uk/en/insights/where-next-for-power-and-utilities.html</p>

        <!--Intro Overlay-->
        <div id="IntroOverlay" style="display: none;">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-xs-12 col-md-6">
                    <h4>Welcome to Connected Source</h4>
                    <p class="intro">
                        Connected Source is a global resource for all staff to find, win, deliver and share using our best, most up-to-date marketing, sales and delivery content. We look forward to  hearing your feedback on this new experience.
                    </p>
                    <p class="intro">
                        By accessing this site, I consent to Connected Source's <a href="/Legal/Termsofuse">Terms and Conditions</a> and agree to appropriately use the materials in line with PwC guidelines and the Strategy&amp; brand (approved for use by <a target="_blank" href="https://brand.pwc.com/strategy-.html">Strategy Consultants in licensed territories</a>).

        </div>
        <script src="/bundles/bootstrap?v=YtNr65qlrVkLH2ila00OwirYn0H5JJbtkHjZL9FDCXM1"></script>

        <!-- Latest compiled and minified CSS -->
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap-select@1.13.14/dist/css/bootstrap-select.min.css">

        <!-- Latest compiled and minified JavaScript -->
        <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap-select@1.13.14/dist/js/bootstrap-select.min.js"></script>
        <script>
            var actualsearchedterm = '';
            //This IIFE will invoke the DataLayer function which is used to set variables used by Adobe Analytics
            var dataLayerCurrentUserGuid = 'degorenko001';
            var dataLayerEncryptedGuid = 'YfxyHo9LIIA10hGm71EBEQ==';

            $(function () {
                $('a.profile-link').on('click', function (e) {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    var href = $(this).attr('href');
                    AuthorUserName = currentUserGuid;
                    CsMetrics.saveProfileMetrics();
                    location = href;
                });
            });

            $(function () {
                initSearchBox();

                //set facet selection from Url
                var selectedFacetId = location.href.match(/searchFacet=[^&]*/g) !== null ? decodeURIComponent(location.href.match(/searchFacet=[^&]*/g)[0]).replace('searchFacet=', '').trim() : '';

                if (selectedFacetId.endsWith("#"))
                    selectedFacetId = selectedFacetId.slice(0, -1);

                if (selectedFacetId.trim() !== '' && location.href.toLowerCase().includes('/search/coveosearchresults')) {
                    //$('#facet-search-list li')

                        if ($('#facet-search-list').text().trim().length > 0) {
                            var selectedElement1 = $('#facet-search-list li[data-advancedquery="' + selectedFacetId + '"')
                            setFacetSelection(selectedElement1, true);
                        }
                        else {
                            getFacetedSearchList(selectedFacetId);
                        }

                    }


                $('#facet-search-list-button').click(function () {
                    if ($('#facet-search-list').text().trim().length > 0) {
                        $('#facet-search-list').toggle()
                    }
                    else {
                        getFacetedSearchList();
                    }

                });

                $('#btnRedirectToasterHide').on('click', function () {
                    // hide toaster
                    $('#redirect-alert').hide('slide');

                    // do not show message for this session
                    sessionStorage.setItem('showRedirectMessageForCurrentSession', '0');

                    // don't show message again if checked
                    if ($('#DontShow').is(':checked')) {
                        $.cookie('ShowRedirectMessage', 0, { path: '/' });
                    }
                });
            });

            // track if user got redirected
            if (sessionStorage.getItem('RedirectedToConnectedSource') == null) {
                sessionStorage.setItem('RedirectedToConnectedSource', (window.location.href.toLowerCase().indexOf('redirectid=') != -1) ? 1 : 0);
            }

            // user navigated to consultingsource and got redirected
            if (sessionStorage.getItem('RedirectedToConnectedSource') == 1) {
                // check if user clicked on 'do not show again'
                if ($.cookie('ShowRedirectMessage') != null) {
                    // user clicked 'do not show again'. hide toaster.
                    $('#redirect-alert').hide('slide');
                }
                else {
                    // user has not clicked 'do not show again'.
                    // check if user closed toaster before.
                    if (sessionStorage.getItem('showRedirectMessageForCurrentSession') != null) {
                        // user closed toaster already. hide it.
                        $('#redirect-alert').hide('slide');
                    }
                    else {
                        // user has not closed toaster before. show it.
                        $('#redirect-alert').show('slide');
                    }
                }
            }
            else {
                // user navigated directly to connectedsource; no redirect
                $('#redirect-alert').hide('slide');
            }

            (function () {
                var currentPageUrl = window.location.href;
                var currentPageName = window.location.pathname;
                DataLayer();

                if (currentPageName !== "/UnifiedSearch/PADetailsFull"){
                    if (typeof _satellite !== 'undefined' && _satellite !== null) {
                        _satellite.track('allPages', { name: currentPageName, url: currentPageUrl });
                    }
                }


                // Capture page click event
                $(document).click(function (e) {
                    // Hide profile drop down when clicking anywhere on the page
                    var profileDropdownIsOpen = $("#collapseProfileItems").hasClass("collapse in");
                    if (profileDropdownIsOpen) {
                        $('#collapseProfileItems').collapse('hide');
                    }

                });

                var isIE11 = !!window.MSInputMethodContext && !!document.documentMode;

                if (isIE11) {
                    $('.submitFeedbackButton').addClass("submitFeedbackButtonIE");
                    positionFeedbackButton();

                    $(window).scroll(function () {
                        positionFeedbackButton();
                    });
                    $(window).resize(function () {
                        positionFeedbackButton();
                    });
                }
            })();
            function setCookie(name, value, expirationInYears) {
                $.cookie(name, value, { path: '/', expires: expirationInYears * 365 });
            }
            function setFacetSelection(selectedElement, fromLoad) {
                $('#facet-search-list li').removeClass("selectedFacet");

                selectedElement.addClass('selectedFacet')
                if (selectedElement.text() != null)
                    $("#facet-search-list-button span").text(selectedElement.text())
                else
                    $("#facet-search-list-button span").text("All");
                if (selectedElement.text().toLowerCase() != "all" && location.href.toLowerCase().includes('/search/coveosearchresults') && fromLoad) {
                    $('#search-facet-display').text(selectedElement.text());
                    $('#search-facet').show();
                }
            }
            function getFacetedSearchList(selectedFacet) {

                $.ajax({
                    url: "/Search/GetFacetedSearchList",
                    type: 'GET',
                    cache: false,
                }).done(function (result) {
                    $('#facet-search-list').html(result);
                    initFacetListColumns();
                    $('#facet-search-list li:not(:has(>h6))').click(function (e) {
                        var itemToSelect = $(e.target);
                        setFacetSelection(itemToSelect, false);
                        $('#facet-search-list').toggle();
                    });

                    if (selectedFacet != null) {
                        console.log(selectedFacet);
                        var itemToSelect = $('#facet-search-list li[data-advancedquery="' + selectedFacet + '"')
                        setFacetSelection(itemToSelect, true);
                    }
                    else
                        $('#facet-search-list').toggle()


                });
            }
            function positionFeedbackButton() {

                var bottomOffset = $(document).height() - ($(window).scrollTop() + $(window).height());

                if (bottomOffset <= 140) {
                    //footer visible
                    $('.submitFeedbackButton').addClass("submitFeedbackButtonBottom");
                }
                else {
                    //footer not visibile
                    $('.submitFeedbackButton').removeClass("submitFeedbackButtonBottom");
                }
            }

            function initFacetListColumns (){
                var initialContainer = $('.columns'),
                    columnItems = $('.columns li'),
                    columns = null,
                    column = 1; // account for initial column

                function updateColumns() {
                    column = 0;
                    var itemsPerColumn = Math.ceil(columnItems.length / columns.length);
                    var index = 0
                    var colHeading;
                    columnItems.each(function (idx, el) {
                        if (index !== 0 && index > itemsPerColumn) {
                            column += 1;
                            index = 0;

                            //add subheading in the new column
                            if (colHeading && colHeading.length > 0) {
                                $(columns.get(column)).append("<li class='facetHeading'><h6 class='facetSubheading'>" + colHeading.text() + " (continued)</h6></li>");
                            }
                        }
                        else {
                            index++;
                        }


                        $(columns.get(column)).append(el);

                        //preserve the last heading
                        colHeading = $(columns.get(column)).find("h6").filter(":last") ;

                    });
                }

                function setupColumns() {
                    columnItems.detach();
                    var requestedColumns = initialContainer.data('columns');
                    while (column < requestedColumns) {
                        initialContainer.clone().insertBefore(initialContainer);
                        column++;
                    }
                    columns = $('.columns');
                    updateColumns();
                }

                $(setupColumns);
            };

        </script>
